Online Patient Management System

Home > Products > Patient Management System

Patient Management Software for Fuelling Better Performance for Clinics, Hospitals & Doctors

Implement end-to-end flows – from admission to discharge.
Hospitals can now enhance the services for the betterment of the patients with the Patient Management Software. This software helps in handling the patients admissions with great ease, allows hospitals to add their bills, bed charges, arrange the admission dates and discharge patients without any fuss. This is indeed the best dedicated software for improving the functioning for Clinics, Hospitals and Doctors.

Benefits of Patient Management Software

Handle Admissions with Ease through DocPulse Patient Management System

Admit patients, assign rooms, accept discounts and print advance receipts.

Create Bills, Discharge and Print Receipt through Patient Database Management System

Easily add bill items,calculate bed charges based on admission dates. Discharge patients

Professional Bill Printouts

Give detailed itemized bill to patients.

Features of Patient Management System

We have everything we need and more !

Admission

Automate admission procedure. Assign beds, collect advances.

Advance/Refunds

Capture advances, print advance receipts manage refunds.

Room Management

Manage room status, setup different type of rooms.

Auto Compute Bed Charges

Automatically compute bed charges based on room types and length of stay.

Insurance Support

Capture insurance payments and print the details.

Discharge Process

Reconcile bills, capture payments, print bills

Discharge Summary Report

Customizable discharge summary report that captures full details of the stay.

Read What Our Customers Say

The DocPulse system has proven to be very useful and has really improved the services in my clinic. I highly appreciate. I highly recommend it.

After looking at various products, I finally zeroed down to Docpulse, which I have been using for the last 2 years. Online booking is seamless, Queue Management & Vaccine reminders are appreciated by my patients. I highly recommend Docpulse.

DocPulse EMR is simple, and easy to use. When patients contact me over e-consultation, all their past history is in one place which helps a lot. The team is very responsive, and I highly recommend them.
